headline.main: KNOX TELLS BRAZIL ALLIES ARE UNITED; U.S. Navy Secretary Says Foes Will Be Overwhelmed

lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Oct. 1 -- "Shoulder to shoulder on land, on the sea and in the air we will fight Tojo and his fellow-saber-rattlers, Mussolini of Italy and Hitler of Germany, in the war imposed upon us by the treacherous blow at Pearl Harbor," declared United States Navy Secretary Frank Knox tonight at a banquet given for him by Admiral Aristides Guilhem, Brazilian Navy Minister.
abstract: Knox s at banquet in his honor given by Brazilian Min A Guilhem; conf with Pres Vargas illus
